::Hot Rod::

He quickly rolled to the side, allowing the shots to miss. He fired two
rockets at either side of Dragonfly. He signals them to go off right
next to him. Not only would this cause some damage, but it makes it hard
to doge an attack. Hot Rod the fires two lasers and two optic blasts at
Dragonfly.
